nodes.text: A sussimi was a nearly-transparent crustacean from the planet Mon Calamari.
This half-meter-long creature were only clearly seen after feeding, because its stomach quickly transformed the food into a transparent intestinal goo.
The creature was a predator with a wicked pinch, using hooked claws to snare little fish. When frightened, it sprayed a caustic transparent ink that had skin-burning acidic properties.
Colonies of sussimis inhabited nests inside reefs and shipwrecks.
Their shells were coveted by transparisteel artists on Dac.
